text: The 2010 China League Two season is the 21st season since its establishment. League kicked off on 9 May 2010.2010中乙赛制重大变革：预赛四循环 大学队优惠终止 ==Group Stage Standings== ===North Group=== * Round 1: Dalian Yiteng 2-2 Liaoning Tiger , Panjin Mengzun 0-1 Dalian Aerbin (9 May) * Round 2: Tianjin Locomotive 2-0 Panjin Mengzun , Liaoning Tiger 0-1 Dalian Aerbin (15 May) * Round 3: Dalian Aerbin 4-1 Dalian Yiteng , Liaoning Tiger 0-1 Tianjin Locomotive (22 May) * Round 4: Dalian Yiteng 0-0 Tianjin Locomotive , Panjin Mengzun 0-0 Liaoning Tiger (29 May) * Round 5: Dalian Yiteng 2-1 Panjin Mengzun , Tianjin Locomotive 0-1 Dalian Aerbin (5 June) * Round 6: Dalian Aerbin 2-0 Panjin Mengzun , Liaoning Tiger 0-0 Dalian Yiteng (17 July) * Round 7: Dalian Aerbin 0-0 Liaoning Tiger , Tianjin Locomotive 0-1 Panjin Mengzun (24 July) * Round 8: Dalian Yiteng 3-0 Dalian Aerbin , Tianjin Locomotive 1-1 Liaoning Tiger (31 July) * Round 9: Tianjin Locomotive 1-0 Dalian Yiteng , Liaoning Tiger 2-1 Panjin Mengzun (7 August) * Round 10: Dalian Aerbin 4-1 Tianjin Locomotive , Panjin Mengzun 0-1 Dalian Yiteng (14 August) * Round 11: Dalian Yiteng 2-1 Liaoning Tiger , Panjin Mengzun 0-4 Dalian Aerbin (21 August) * Round 12: Panjin Mengzun 2-1 Tianjin Locomotive , Liaoning Tiger 2-1 Dalian Aerbin (28 August) * Round 13: Dalian Aerbin 3-1 Dalian Yiteng , Liaoning Tiger 2-1 Tianjin Locomotive (4 September) * Round 14: Dalian Yiteng 1-2 Tianjin Locomotive , Panjin Mengzun 1-1 Liaoning Tiger (11 September) * Round 15: Dalian Yiteng 2-1 Panjin Mengzun , Tianjin Locomotive 1-0 Dalian Aerbin (18 September) * Round 16: Liaoning Tiger 0-5 Dalian Yiteng (25 September) , Dalian Aerbin 2-1 Panjin Mengzun (26 September) * Round 17: Dalian Aerbin 3-0 Liaoning Tiger , Tianjin Locomotive 4-0 Panjin Mengzun (2 October) * Round 18: Dalian Yiteng 1-0 Dalian Aerbin , Tianjin Locomotive 0-1 Liaoning Tiger (9 October) * Round 19: Tianjin Locomotive 0-1 Dalian Yiteng , Liaoning Tiger 0-4 Panjin Mengzun (16 October) * Round 20: Dalian Aerbin 3-0 Tianjin Locomotive , Panjin Mengzun 2-1 Dalian Yiteng (23 October) ===South Group=== * Round 1: Wenzhou Provenza 2-2 Guizhou Zhicheng , Hubei Kangtian 0-2 Tianjin Songjiang (9 May) * Round 2: Wenzhou Provenza 1-1 Tianjin Songjiang , Sichuan Meilianshu 2-1 Hubei Kangtian (15 May) * Round 3: Tianjin Songjiang 1-1 Guizhou Zhicheng , Wenzhou Provenza 0-1 Sichuan Meilianshu (22 May) * Round 4: Hubei Kangtian 1-2 Wenzhou Provenza , Guizhou Zhicheng 1-1 Sichuan Meilianshu (29 May) * Round 5: Guizhou Zhicheng 0-0 Hubei Kangtian , Sichuan Meilianshu 0-2 Tianjin Songjiang (5 June) * Round 6: Tianjin Songjiang 3-0 Hubei Kangtian , Guizhou Zhicheng 3-1 Wenzhou Provenza (17 July) * Round 7: Tianjin Songjiang 3-0 Wenzhou Provenza , Hubei Kangtian 1-1 Sichuan Meilianshu (24 July) * Round 8: Guizhou Zhicheng 0-1 Tianjin Songjiang , Sichuan Meilianshu 0-0 Wenzhou Provenza (31 July) * Round 9: Wenzhou Provenza 2-2 Hubei Kangtian , Sichuan Meilianshu 1-1 Guizhou Zhicheng (7 August) * Round 10: Tianjin Songjiang 4-1 Sichuan Meilianshu (14 August), Hubei Kangtian 2-1 Guizhou Zhicheng (16 August) * Round 11: Wenzhou Provenza 0-2 Guizhou Zhicheng , Hubei Kangtian 1-0 Tianjin Songjiang (21 August) * Round 12: Wenzhou Provenza 0-5 Tianjin Songjiang , Sichuan Meilianshu 0-0 Hubei Kangtian (28 August) * Round 13: Tianjin Songjiang 0-0 Guizhou Zhicheng , Wenzhou Provenza 2-2 Sichuan Meilianshu (4 September) * Round 14: Hubei Kangtian 2-1 Wenzhou Provenza , Guizhou Zhicheng 0-1 Sichuan Meilianshu (12 September) * Round 15: Guizhou Zhicheng 0-0 Hubei Kangtian , Sichuan Meilianshu 0-1 Tianjin Songjiang (18 September) * Round 16: Tianjin Songjiang 2-2 Hubei Kangtian , Guizhou Zhicheng 2-0 Wenzhou Provenza (25 September) * Round 17: Tianjin Songjiang 2-1 Wenzhou Provenza , Hubei Kangtian 0-0 Sichuan Meilianshu (2 October) * Round 18: Guizhou Zhicheng 1-1 Tianjin Songjiang , Sichuan Meilianshu 1-1 Wenzhou Provenza (9 October) * Round 19: Wenzhou Provenza 0-0 Hubei Kangtian , Sichuan Meilianshu 0-1 Guizhou Zhicheng (16 October) * Round 20: Tianjin Songjiang 2-1 Sichuan Meilianshu, Hubei Kangtian 1-1 Guizhou Zhicheng (23 October) ==Play- offs== *Play-off finalists promotes to China League One. ===First round=== ====First
